Who is eligible
to become
a Semrush
for Education
Partner?
If you are an educator at an accredited college or university that provides associate's, bachelor's, master's or MBA degrees from limited regions, including the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada, New Zealand, European Union, Serbia, Argentina, or India, you are welcome to apply to become a Semrush for Education partner.
Our program is designed to work through a direct partnership with college or university educators who integrate it within their degree course(s) curriculum for students to complete by passing an exam.
What’s included?
Semrush licenses-promo-codes for you and your students
Four video modules with unique content recorded by the experts
Exclusive Semrush Academy certificate upon completion
It's completely free for 3 months!
Learn more
Get started in 4 easy steps
1
Submit the online application to Become a Partner. If you fulfil all the criteria in the application form, we will contact you within five working days.
2
Provide us with the details about your Digital Marketing class and get access for your students to the educational modules and a toolkit to seamlessly add course material into your classroom.
3
Create your own real-world marketing assignments using Semrush tools.
4
Students receive an exclusive Semrush for Education Certification upon completing each module and passing the exam.

FAQ
Who is eligible for the Semrush for Education program?
We collaborate with accredited colleges and universities that provide associate’s, bachelor's, master's, and MBA degrees from limited regions, including the United States, United Kingdom, European Union, Serbia, Australia, Canada, New Zealand, and India. Our program is designed to work through a direct partnership with college or university educators who integrate it within their degree course(s) curriculum for students to complete by passing an exam.
How do I become a Semrush for Education partner?
To apply and learn more about this program, visit our dedicated Semrush for Education page and select the "Become a Partner" option to begin the application process.
What is included in the Semrush for Education program?
The program provides educators and students FREE access to Semrush. Your students will gain access to the Semrush Toolkit, video modules, and an exclusive certification.
Will I get a Semrush certification after completing the program?
Yes! Students who successfully complete the modules in this program will receive an exclusive Semrush Academy certification.
What is the level of the Semrush for Education program?
The Semrush for Education program is primarily intended for individuals at the collegiate level who are looking to gain a solid foundation in digital marketing concepts and tools. It is designed to provide valuable insights and practical knowledge to students before they enter the marketing field professionally.
How many modules does the Semrush for Education program have?
The “Digital Marketing: Hands-on Experience” course features a set of four video modules produced by industry experts, covering the most important aspects of digital marketing and using Semrush tools.
The four modules cover SEO, Content Marketing, Social Media Marketing, and Marketing Analytics.
